text: The current shortage of baby formula is unacceptable and we need to hold the @US_FDA accountable. This week I joined 21 of my colleagues in a letter to @DrCaliff_FDA demanding answers on these shortages which are hurting young families across Missouri
Across Missouri parents searching for baby formula are finding empty shelves and out-of-stock notices. The Biden administration couldâ€™ve taken action months ago to get ahead of this crisis.
